comments.body: Does the linux one need to get patched too so that it includes the `$CONDA_PREFIX/lib/libmagic.so`? Maybe this is implicitly handled with the PATH manipulations that conda is doing?
Yep, it's not needed for Linux; conda implicitly changes the PATH.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +11,15 @@                        'win32': windows_dlls,
                        'cygwin': windows_dlls,
                        'linux': ['libmagic.so.1'],    # fallback for some Linuxes (e.g. Alpine) where library search does not work
